    A wrapper for the Hyperledger Channel update configuration

    • Constructor Detail

      • UpdateChannelConfiguration

        public UpdateChannelConfiguration()
        The constructor for the UpdateChannelConfiguration wrapper. You will need to use the Channel.updateChannelConfiguration(UpdateChannelConfiguration, byte[]...) method to populate the update channel configuration

      • UpdateChannelConfiguration

                           throws IOException

      • getUpdateChannelConfigurationAsBytes

        public byte[] getUpdateChannelConfigurationAsBytes()
